ValidationRule.description: number of Interpreters or method or End/Start Time can't be blank when status is approved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Godkjent") && (ISBLANK(InterpretationMethod__c) || ISBLANK(NumberOfInterpreters__c) || ISBLANK( EndTime__c) || ISBLANK( StartTime__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Fill up number of Interpreters, Interpretation Method, Start Time, End Time
